name: Philosopher's Stone
description: A weightless charm created by an enchanter with a powerful scorn for brute force.
trivia: This item's name and effect are a reference to alchemy, an ancient philosophy revolving around transmutating materials into other materials by purifying them. In alchemy, the philosopher's stone is a substance capable of turning "lesser metals" like mercury into "noble metals" like gold or silver.
